/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. Pedestrians can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
